data.name: Mythrealm
data.detailed_description:
Mythrealm is a Singleplayer Fantasy Action RPG in which you play as the heroic female adventurer: Aelaris.

Awakening in an unknown place, brought there by some magical power, she must find her way out of the underworld and discover the purpose of her quest. Explore doom filled dungeons, dangerous wilderness, and even other planes of mystical reality. Uncover clues as to the history and fate of the land of Arloria. Discover untold riches hidden in forgotten troves and recover the magical artifacts of forgotten heroes and lost civilisations. Guide Aelaris out of darkness and onward to epic adventures as she seeks to save the world from unfathomable foes!

Fight For Survival and For Glory!

Mythrealm is a real time action RPG, with skill based melee, ranged, and magic combat. Your ability to attack tactically and move gracefully will determine the outcome of combat encounters. Use the environment to your advantage and choose the right weapons to face your foe. Fight full on with Two Handed Weapons, defend with Sword and Shield, or take down your enemies from range with Arrows or Bolts of Magical Energy and powerful Spells!

Leap, Roll, Climb, and Overcome!

The underworld of Arloria and the realms beyond are places fraught with danger for the unweary. To escape forbidden dungeons and ascend to the heights where she might find clues to her quest, Aelaris must use her skills as a daring adventurer and athlete to climb cragged cliffs, leap over ravines, and evade deadly traps! Some treasures in the Mythrealm are hidden where only the most fearless adventurer will dare to go!

Advance Aelaris Your Own Way!

Aelaris is a versatile and magically gifted hero. Based on your choices you can build her into a variety of exciting Character Builds. From steadfast armoured Knight, to brilliantly powerful Wizard, to agile and deadly Archer, or any combination of these. Mythrealm features a simple but robust Character Development System that allows the player to create their own unique Hero Builds for Aelaris. Synergise your Hero Build with mystical items and magical weapons to create the perfect hero!

Claim and Trade Epic Treasure!

The relics of the lost civilisations of Arloria are hidden in the dark subteranean coves scattered across the land. What treasures and secrets do they keep?
The currency of the kingdom may buy Aelaris a variety of weapons, items, and salves, but the most powerful enchanted treasures may only be found in the chests of the most feared and dangerous creatures. Aelaris must reclaim the treasures of Arloria and restore them to their former glory in the hands of a noble hero!

Battle Monsters from a Dark Beyond!

In the centuries that the land has been left unguarded since the departure of the Wizards of Arloria, dark things have crept from the underworld and now seek domination of a once peaceful and happy kingdom. Demons have ascended from their hellish circles to corrupt the world and Undead crawl from their graves to feast upon the living. Only one hero can fight back the darkness and save Arloria from encroaching doom.

Take up arms brave hero and battle for the fate of the Mythrealm!

data.short_description: Explore a fallen land of mystery and lore. Battle against dark and ancient monsters. Traverse deadly pitfalls, and advance your character in this fantasy 3rd person action RPG. Uncover the chaos that is darkening the land and fight for the magic that empowers the Mythrealm.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 - 64 Bit
  • Processor: Requires a 64-bit, Dual Core 3.0GHz processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 or DirectX 12 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 - 64 Bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 3.0 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 or DirectX 12 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
